Many moms have a child care story that sounds a lot like mine. Juggling a growing family & holding a teaching job was tough as nails. Without child care, I was a goner. That’s why I’m fighting for universal child care in our end-of-year budget. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRS9zZAUQAAiUqN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/942584029311746048/vid/320x180/_r0HkSfksvDC-hCh.mp4

The #ThomasFire is now the third-largest fire in California’s history. Red flag warnings remain in effect through 8 p.m. tonight. Please be alert for evacuation announcements. 
https://twitter.com/LANow/status/942429703125610496 QT @LANow Thomas Fire continues to grow as strong, shifting winds bring new dangers http://www.latimes.com/local/lanow/la-me-thomas-fire-ledeall-20171217-story.html?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter

With winds picking up again, it’s important to be prepared in case of evacuation. Remember the 6 P’s:
✅People & pets
✅Papers & other important documents
✅Prescriptions & eyeglasses
✅Pictures 
✅Personal computer hard drive & disks
✅“Plastic” (credit cards, ATM cards & cash)
